segments.text: Awful ! My cell phone is out of service again . Fred , can you lend me some money ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 200yuan . I bought a computer online , so I have to pay the mortgage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am so sorry to hear that . Is that enough ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's so nice of you . You really make my day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Forget it ! We seemingly need to gather money little by little .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What you said is absolutely right . I will pay you back as soon as I get back on my feet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No rush . You can give it back whenever you have it .
segments.speaker: S2
